message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and holds immense value for those who appreciate its capabilities. Given its rarity and quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12000. Considering the exclusive features and potential benefits it could bring to someone like yourself, I propose a special introductory price of $15000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a premium price before it potentially increases further in value. I trust you'll find the investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
